messages.subject: Oops!  So Sorry
messages.msgSnippet: ... for the Confusion and mis-post. Re. SC diploma bill. I had 2 forwards from Kelly and confused the sites of origin. She just sent me Sandra s response to my
messages.messageBody:
... for the Confusion and mis-post.

Re. SC diploma bill.

I had 2 forwards from Kelly and confused the sites of
origin.

She just sent me Sandra's response to my mis-post.

I think I'll leave messed-up-enough alone.

Anyone who's interested can see the issue at
unschooling.com- or so I have been told.

Unfortunately, I don't always have time to read every
post at the homeschooling sites I belong to. They can
number in the hundreds on any given day and Life takes
precedence here.

Kelly and I depend on each other to send on those we
think will be of particular interest to each other ...
I just missed the correct site.

Again, please forgive my mis-placed post.

Melinda



=====
: D Melinda
